name: TV Classic Sleuths Multiple Choice Quiz | Professions on TV | 10 Questions

questions.text: Robert Reed started with 'The Defenders' and ended up in 'The Brady Bunch'. In between, he had a recurring role as a cop in this tv series. Which one?
questions.explanation:
'Mannix'.

	With Mike Connors. Jack Warden did 'NYPD'; Buddy Ebsen was Barnaby Jones. Robert Taylor starred in 'The Detectives'.

questions.text: Herschel Bernardi did a fine job as Tevye in 'Fiddler on the Roof', but his early career included a stint as a cop on this tv series. Which one?
questions.explanation:
'Peter Gunn'.

	With Craig Stevens and Lola Albright. Reed Hadley starred in 'Racket Squad'; William Conrad was Cannon.

questions.text: Which of these series was set in N.Y.?
Lee Marvin got started with a role in what tv series?
questions.explanation:
'M Squad'.

	Robert Urich was Spenser; James Franciscus was Longstreet. Dennis Weaver was McCloud.

questions.text: Similarly, Darren McGavin started in a tv series. Which one?
questions.explanation:
'Mike Hammer'.

	Jack Klugman was Quincy. Martin Milner and George Maharis were in '66'. Milner also starred in 'Adam 12'.

questions.text: Edd Byrnes enjoyed popularity as 'Kookie' on which series?
questions.explanation:
'77 Sunset Strip'.

	With Roger Smith and Efrem Zimbalist, Jr. Robert Urich starred in 'Vegas'. 'Eye' and '6' were old-time tv shows.

questions.text: Peter Lawford starred in which tv series?
questions.explanation:
'Thin Man'.

	With Phyllis Kirk. Broderick Crawford starred in 'Patrol', David Brian was the D.A. and Barry Newman was Petrocelli.

questions.text: Noah Beery had a regular role in which series?
questions.explanation:
'Rockford Files'.

	Beery played James Garner's father. 'Streets' featured Karl Malden and Michael Douglas. '5-O' starred Jack Lord; Tom Selleck was Magnum.

questions.text: Jim Hutton starred in which series?
questions.explanation:
'Ellery Queen'.

	Judd Hirsch was Delvecchio and David Janssen was Harry Orwell. Ben Gazzara starred in 'Run For Your Life'.

questions.text: Efrem Zimbalist, Jr. starred in which series?
questions.explanation:
'The F.B.I.'

	Rock Hudson was McMillan and Pierce Brosnan was Steele. Many people (including Kate Jackson) starred in 'The Rookies'.
